leadingComments.value: Listen for subtitle track change, then extract the current track ID.

trailingComments.value: Clear loaded cues on media detachment from tracks
Disable all subtitle tracks before detachment so when reattached only tracks in that content are enabled.

*
     * @desc
     * get alternate subtitle tracks list from playlist *
     * @lineNumber
     * 260

*
     * @desc
     * get/set index of the selected subtitle track (based on index in subtitle track lists) *
     * @lineNumber
     * 265
     * @type
     * {number}

value.raw: Could not construct new URL with HLS Delivery Directives:
value.cooked: Could not construct new URL with HLS Delivery Directives:

trailingComments.value:
*
     * @desc
     * Disables the old subtitleTrack and sets current mode on the next subtitleTrack.
     * This operates on the DOM textTracks.
     * A value of -1 will disable all subtitle tracks.
     * @lineNumber
     * 308
     * @param
     * {number} newId

*
     * @desc
     * This method is responsible for validating the subtitle index and periodically reloading if live.
     * Dispatches the SUBTITLE_TRACK_SWITCH event, which instructs the subtitle-stream-controller to load the selected track.
     * @lineNumber
     * 339
     * @param
     * {number} newId
     * @param
     * {undefined} lastTrack

leadingComments.value:
*
     * @desc
     * Disables the old subtitleTrack and sets current mode on the next subtitleTrack.
     * This operates on the DOM textTracks.
     * A value of -1 will disable all subtitle tracks.
     * @lineNumber
     * 308
     * @param
     * {number} newId

trailingComments.value: setting this.subtitleTrack will trigger internal logic
if media has not been attached yet, it will fail
we keep a reference to the default track id
and we'll set subtitleTrack when onMediaAttached is triggered

leadingComments.value: setting this.subtitleTrack will trigger internal logic
if media has not been attached yet, it will fail
we keep a reference to the default track id
and we'll set subtitleTrack when onMediaAttached is triggered

trailingComments.value: exit if track id as already set or invalid
stopping live reloading timer if any
